extendedInfo.description: This is a free and convenient GO SMS Pro Facebook Chat plug-in; it integrate well with GO SMS Pro, making good use of the amazing facilities in GO SMS Pro, such as themes, chat/list style, searching, backup&restore, and etc.â¥ You should install the *latest* GO SMS Pro(now is v3.33) and this plug-in â¥ Your official Facebook client should have been able to login Features:1. Integrate well with GO SMS Pro; Easy to chat; Customizable notification ringtone; etc2. Instant messages, text are sent/received through Facebook Chat network, no SMS or MMS.3. Sync with Facebook group4. Support setting notification5. Support smiley6. Support chat style and list style7. Support sharing to SNS** Related Info**- Visit our Blog: http://gosms.goforandroid.com- Visit our Facebook profile: GO SMS FBChat Plugin- Twitter id: GOSMSPro- Email to us: gomessanger@gmail.com======================================================FB Chat v2.0 updates (2011-10-12)-Fix login Force Close issue, due to Facebook has updated its server protocol

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: This is a great appp which is simple to use however it would be much better if there was a search bar for finding your friends imstead of scrolling through the list.
reviews.author: Emily Tanner

reviews.title: Great !
reviews.comment: This App Is Amazing Freakin\' Love It !! It\'s Better Than Messaging On Facebook With My Phone It\'s Simple
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Sometimes it doesn\'t receive messages, I haven\'t found more than that. Can that be fixed? Other than that, Its a good plug in :)    -HTC Wildfire S-
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: Nice but needs improvement in quick loading of friend lists because when we login it takes so much of time to load all friends and if i push my list down it suddenly comes again and again to top ... Fix this issue please...Samsung galaxy y
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ratee..!
reviews.comment: uhm it works really good except when i trt to scroll down to see everyboii else on online it doesnt work...need ta fix asap but other than that its fine
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Daisia
reviews.comment: I love this app,but could we get an update???????????????
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: REALLY ITS bettr than Other FBK chats.. Notifications are on time:) Verysimple & can backup my chats via Go Sms :-) THANK YOU.. GO DEV TEAM!!! NEED SOME UPDATES SUCH AS SEARCHING FRIENDS :) OVERALL M LOVIN IT :)\tSIMPLY AWESOME:-)
reviews.author: Thamarai kannan

reviews.title: Ggji
reviews.comment: I cannot navigate it easily.. when im searching for someone iy goes back to the tap.. so hard to use
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.comment: Getting my messages, nice integration with text app, like that better than using a separate app for fb chat. My only complaint is that it doesn\'t sync w/ fb chat so whole chunks of conversation is missing. Overall, working well!
reviews.author: Theresa Matthiesen

reviews.title: Samsung infuse
reviews.comment: This was my fave. app but its not no more it dont work as before i never recive any messeges and its tooooooo slow now it dosent let me log in
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I love this app I just have one problem it logs its self out. Please fix and I will give five stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good concept
reviews.comment: Good program other then it doesn\'t stay logged in. always logs itself out every couple minutes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Confused
reviews.comment: I downloaded this apo because I thought that I could get FB messages to my SMS inbox, without needing wifi. Is this a possibility? If not, there\'s no reason for it to be taking up space in my phone.   Also, as many others have said... It brings me back to the top of the list when I scroll down, and it gets rather frusterating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great application
reviews.comment: Great app but the new icon isn\'t easy to see in my status bar so I can never tell whether I\'m online or not....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Chipmunk
reviews.comment: Luv dis app have no problems I\'m able to talk 2 my friends no matter where I am
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this! I\'d give five stars If a search bar was added. (I have a lot of friends)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worst
reviews.comment: It is not working.when I downloaded this plugin it worked properly,but after 1month it stopped working.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: bst app
reviews.comment: hey im mukul. i have galaxy andtiod. i recommended this app. ye fb chat nimbuzz ebuddy sub bekar hai. andriod k liye.  i aleady installed.  go sms theme fb chat ye go k hai all r performing awosome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its great
reviews.comment: I love it. I\'m at job corps where we don\'t have wifi so i can\'t get on Facebook and chat. But with this app i can chat with friends all over the place. Well the friends on my Facebook thank you so much for making this app. Works great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Facebook widget
reviews.comment: It\'s a great app for Facebook. It change my friends friendship
reviews.author: A Google User
